subdisciplines.name: Quantum chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The branch of physical chemistry that applies quantum mechanics to chemical systems and chemical processes.

subdisciplines.name: Thermodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The branch of physical chemistry concerned with the relationships between heat, work, and chemical reactions.

subdisciplines.name: Electrochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The branch of physical chemistry that studies the relationship between electricity and chemical reactions.
